flawed_nl_solution:
The pumpkin patch sold 96 / 3 = <<96/3=32>>32 pumpkins.
They have 83 - 32 = <<83-32=54>>54 pumpkins left.
Thus, the pumpkin patch will produce 54 / 3 = <<54/3=18>>18 cans of pie filling.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 51, not 54. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
